scripts.start:kit: npm run build:apps && npm run publish:apps && aragon run --kit Kit --kit-init @ARAGON_ENS
scripts.compile: aragon contracts compile && npm run lint
scripts.build:apps: npm run compile && lerna run --concurrency=1 --stream build
scripts.devchain: ganache-cli --db ~/.aragon/ganache-db-8545 --mnemonic "explain tackle mirror kit van hammer degree position ginger unfair soup bonus" --gasLimit 50000000
